title: Trixie Belden Mystery-Quiz Book Number 2
description: This book is a second supplement to the popular Trixie Belden mystery series. The introduction of local Sleepyside citizens is included alongside returning characters from the series. The book contents include short one-minute mysteries, quizzes, logic puzzles, and brain teasers. Comic strips are also found among these pages of fun for Trixie Belden fans of all ages.
author: Kathryn Kenny
